ratings.comment: The material isn't all that interesting, but he manages to make it pretty fun to listen to. Be sure to listen for the occasional bad dad joke. Lab gets easier as the semester goes on. Be sure to study very hard for the practical. Lab directors are all very helpful and fun. Lecture exams and practical are tough and require a lot of studying.

He's an okay lecturer in class--depending on the content he can be mildly interesting or a bore. But be prepared for a ridiculous exam. Questions are extremely specific and are on facts that you never will have to recall again. He tests very little on understanding of the concepts--mostly small picky details.

The is definitely the most boring lecturer of the 4 Zoology professors. He doesn't explain most confusing concepts or spend a long time explaining something that needs no explaining. In his defense, the other lecturers are really good so the bar is set high.

He's pretty old school--uses ancient-looking overhead slides. Overall, a decent lecturer, gets to the point, speaks clearly, but not very helpful one-on-one.  Practice exams are representative of the actual test. The lab requires MANY HOURS devoted outside of class, so prepare to spend your weekend at the lab studying for one of six in-lab exams.

Poor lecturer, didn't explain very well and just read through his slides- too fast to copy down so you were forced to waste paper printing slides off if you wanted to have any idea what he was talking about. Pointless and really easy to fall asleep in lecture.

wow, i really liked my zoo class until the lecturer switched to bleiweiss. he is a HORRIBLE lecturer, i went to every class before he took over and stopped going because i just fell asleep during his.
I liked him. I thought his test questions were fair.  He could get a little confusing at times.
The most boring lecturer ever. He explains concepts really poorly, too. Avoid if possible.
lectures = boring, poor emphasis on important material,  RELATED STUFF TO STAR TREK??? seems like a decent guy though just not for teaching.
very boring, his jokes are not funny, and he just reads off his notes which he posts online, so class is not nesessary

This guy is not a real great lecturer and goes too indepth on one powerpoint slide and some of his exam questions are pretty dumb. he just teaches like a 1/4 of the semester though. good guy and will help if you ask,just that his lectures lack some clarity and put you to sleep
